title: Grams of KIO3 needed to prepare 2 L of 0.1-M soln

content.question: A student wishes to prepare 2.00 liters of 0.100–mo­lar KIO3 (molecular weight 214). The proper proce­dure is to weigh out

choices.label: 42.8 grams of KIO3 and add 2.00 kilograms of H2O
42.8 grams of KIO3 and add H2O until the fi­nal homogeneous solution has a volume of 2.00 liters
21.4 grams of KIO3 and add H2O until the fi­nal homogeneous solution has a volume of 2.00 liters
42.8 grams of KIO3 and add 2.00 liters of H2O

content.answer: 42.8 grams of KIO3 and add H2O until the fi­nal homogeneous solution has a volume of 2.00 liters

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
